summary:
I’m a sustainability professional that specializes in bridging sustainability initiatives and sustainability reporting processes with the sustainable development agenda. 

For over ten years I’ve been working with global companies and multiple stakeholders, such as international organizations, policy-makers, NGOs, to advance the private sector contribution toward the Sustainable Development Goals and build and inclusive and fair societies.  

I currently lead global engagements and advocacy efforts in multilateral platforms and international forums, such as the G20, the UN General Assembly, the High-Level Political Forum on Sustainable Development (HLPF), and COPs. I work towards building GRI’s influence at these, advocating for the relevance of driving transparency and reporting based on the GRI Standards, which accounts for external impacts, and strengthen the role of GRI-based reporting in connection to the UN SDGs. 

I have a background in international relations and corporate social responsibility. I’m committed to creating shared value through sustainability initiatives and scaling up sustainable practices while advocating for the achievement of the Global Goals.

profile_positions.title: Policy Senior Coordinator, Government Affairs & Strategic Relations

profile_positions.description:
Previously at GRI, I managed corporate programs and developed content and learning materials that build capacity for sustainability reporting, including on the SDGs. I was responsible for the development, planning, implementation, content development and program outputs, such as articles, publications and events.

Together with partners, I co-managed the Corporate Action Group for Reporting on the SDGs from 2019 to 2020, a knowledge-sharing and peer-to-peer learning platform that supported businesses to advance their contribution towards sustainable development. The program engaged senior business representatives from over a dozen of countries in a thought leadership program that enabled companies to define and improve their contribution to the SDGs. 

After this, I led the Business Leadership Forum on Corporate Reporting as a Driver to Achieving the SDGs, an international thought leadership program that brought together sustainability reporting practitioners, key stakeholders, and data users. 
- The program engaged more than 130 sustainability experts and leaders across 8 stakeholder groups. 
- Through a series of 8 online workshops, we brought together businesses with leading experts from key stakeholder groups. They facilitated dialogues focused on understanding data users’ needs and expectations related to corporate sustainability and SDG reporting. 
- 7 summary papers were developed, and are freely available to the entire community of sustainability practitioners and advocates. 
- To further disseminate the learnings and thought leadership produced by the Forum, a series of 4 masterclasses and open webinars were conducted. Through these, we reached a wide audience of over 2,720 sustainability practitioners. 

Besides, I develop high-quality content and learning materials that build capacity for sustainability reporting, directed to different audiences through multiple channels (webinars, workshops, reports, and e-learnings courses).
profile_positions.title: Senior Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
R.E.D. de empresas por la diversidad is a collective initiative founded and integrated by global companies and other stakeholders committed to building diverse and inclusive workplaces as well as improving D&I initiatives in Argentina and across Latin-America.

I worked as a program coordinator at R.E.D., where I gained experience in developing and delivering programs or projects that organize subject matter experts with practical experience within large and complex organizations towards common goals. 

I prepared annual projects and events and coordinated multiple projects simultaneously, resulting in: 3 guidebooks, 1 toolkit, 16 member assemblies, 10 events for the corporate community, 11 events for member companies, 2 international events, 2 campaigns and 3 editions. 

I achieved the aforementioned results by managing partnerships and relations among member companies, non-member companies, experts, NGOs and the public sector in order to align and coordinate efforts in implementing D&I and Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) programs. I collaborated on teams composed by managers and directors of HR or Corporate Social Responsibility/Sustainability from international companies with the goal of developing sustainable business strategies and solutions through research and cross-sector collaboration. 

In addition, I scouted, approached and engaged new partners in the public, private and third sectors as well as engaged with businesses in the wider corporate community while advocating for the network. I researched D&I and CSR policies, initiatives, best practices and latest trends and co-authored 3 guidebooks and a toolkit. I created content for social media and institutional communications as well as designed and managed campaigns for companies.
